verbs.description: " It [V: 's] [ARG2: a little tough] [ARG1: to watch too much] , but I watched as much as I could , " Trump said , surrounded by members of the Paralympic team .
" It 's a little tough to [V: watch] [ARGM-EXT: too much] , but I watched as much as I could , " Trump said , surrounded by members of the Paralympic team .
